text: Hearing that Eglinton has REOPENED between Martin Grove and Islington. Was closed for a #GasLeak. Ramps from 427 to Eglinton OPEN.
UPDATE: EB Eglinton lanes are now open between Martin Grove and Islington.  WB remains blocked because of a gas leak.
Yeah they *said* it was a major gas leak & no trains were going there but I have my suspicions. #commonasmuck
